languages.text: "Арджента, проследи, чтобы Экклезиархия не пропустила мимо ушей стон неимущих".
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."
languages.original_text: "Арджента, проследи, чтобы Экклезиархия не пропустила мимо ушей стон неимущих".

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy would not miss the groan of the poor."
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy would not miss the groan of the poor."
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy would not ignore the laments of the poor."
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy would not ignore the laments of the poor."
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."
"Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."

languages.text: “阿洁塔，让国教不要漠视穷人的哀鸣。”
languages.original_text: "Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔，让国教不要漠视穷人的哀鸣。”
“阿洁塔，请让国教留意穷人的哀鸣。”

languages.text: «Argenta, procura que la Eclesiarquía no ignore las quejas de los pobres».
languages.original_text: "Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."

traits.locale_text: «Argenta, procura que la Eclesiarquía no ignore las quejas de los pobres».

languages.text: 「アルジェンタ、帝国聖教会が貧民の挽歌を無視しないよう、取り計らうのだぞ」
languages.original_text: "Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."

traits.locale_text: 「アルジェンタ、帝国聖教会が貧民の挽歌を無視しないよう、取り計らうのだぞ」
「アルジェンタ、帝国聖教会が貧民の挽歌を無視しないよう、取り計らうのだぞ」

languages.text: « Argenta, faites en sorte que l'Ecclésiarchie ne fasse pas la sourde oreille aux supplications du peuple. »
languages.original_text: "Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."

traits.locale_text: « Argenta, faites en sorte que l'Ecclésiarchie ne fasse pas la sourde oreille aux supplications du peuple. »

languages.text: "Argenta, sorgt dafür, dass die Ekklesiarchie die Beschwerden der Vertriebenen nicht ignoriert."
languages.original_text: "Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, sorgt dafür, dass die Ekklesiarchie die Beschwerden der Vertriebenen nicht ignoriert."
"Argenta, sorgt dafür, dass die Ekklesiarchie die Beschwerden der Armen nicht ignoriert."

languages.text: "Argenta, Ekleşiarşi'nin zavallıların kederlerini görmezden gelmediğinden emin ol."
languages.original_text: "Argenta, see to it that the Ecclesiarchy does not ignore the laments of the dispossessed."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, Ekleşiarşi'nin zavallıların kederlerini görmezden gelmediğinden emin ol."
